reviews.review: cool game still in these days
Very good game that I'm totally not reviewing for the Summer Sale tasks thingy, also DOOR'S STUCK.

This game needs no introduction, really. I've spent my entire childhood playing pirate version of this game, so not buying it on steam would be disrespectful. If you want to feel these good old times again, buy it. It has everything that you could ever want in 00's. Bad mics, constant dramas between 40 yos..

Esto es nostalgia muchachos
Esto es...
Counter Strike


10/10
Very good game. Grew up playing this, i'm not disappointed.
The classic Counter Strike experience, how can you not love that?
The code for the bomb is 7355608 btw
GOAT FPS, legendary movement and aim mechanics.
